entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 11. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of flurries after midnight. Flurries beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 21 this evening. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
